alert.note: Alert for Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 5:16AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Sebastian, eastern Haskell, southern Sequoyah, northeastern Latimer and Le Flore Counties through 600 AM CDT... At 516 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles southwest of Gans to 2 miles northwest of Red Oak. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Poteau... Greenwood... Pocola... Heavener... Spiro... Panama... Wister... Hackett... Howe... Hartford... Bonanza... Keota... Red Oak... Mccurtain... Bokoshe... Fanshawe... Midland... Gans... Cameron... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 299 and 301. Interstate 540 near mile marker 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for west central Arkansas...and southeastern and east central Oklahoma.
